name: NRG Energy, Inc.
summary: NRG Energy, Inc. is a leading integrated power company engaged in the production, sale, and delivery of electricity and energy products to residential, commercial, and industrial customers across major competitive power markets in the United States. Headquartered in Houston, Texas, NRG operates a diverse portfolio of generation assets and retail brands, serving millions of customers and advocating for competitive energy markets and sustainable energy solutions. The company is publicly traded and consistently ranks among the Fortune 500.
